content:
The next moment,
I heard the splash of water,
and a beautiful Lili fish leaped from the surface!

But why would the butterfly choose that place to rest...
Hmm, never mind~
Not every mystery in life needs to be answered.
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, I've got something interesting to tell you. Remember when you suggested I should <color=#8AAB4B>observe the flight paths of butterflies</color>?

But in the blink of an eye, the trail vanished!
It's such a shame.
I wish I could witness something so marvelous once more...

Was that a bit abstract? I'm just expressing myself.
Different lives may appear totally different on the surface,
but perhaps they share the same ebbs and flows of life.

When I peered through my telescope at the celestial river—
The silhouette of butterfly wings appeared in the sky,
Glowing with light...

So at night, when I used my telescope to gaze at the Milky Way,
I saw that wing-shaped light appear.
Fascinating, isn't it?
So, should I...{短暂停} observe the flight paths of butterflies, or trace the trajectories of fish swimming in water?

You mean... tracing the path of destiny?
{开心}That does sound like something you'd do.
Alright, I'll take your advice.
This time I followed the trail of light quietly, watching as it twisted and turned... Until at a certain drop in the water's surface, it revealed its true form!

So, I drew a deep breath,
clasped my hands together,
and made a wish!

The universe is an endless cycle without boundaries.
The ebb and flow of life follows its rhythm,
revealing its vast existence through tiny glimmers of light.
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, do you remember that glowing trail beneath the water? I've finally encountered it again!
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, do you remember that glowing trail beneath the water? I've finally encountered it again!
But when I put down the telescope and looked back at the Celestial River, everything had vanished...

It was a butterfly!
During the daytime, a butterfly perched on my telescope,
and the scales of its wings left traces on the lens.

I spent the whole day staring at butterflies that day.
Then that night, something mysterious happened!

<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, remember that thing about the fish swimming patterns? 
Hey, between you and me... I've come across something really mysterious.
...a shimmering golden path of light that sent my imagination running wild. Though, I feel like I've seen something similar before...
Butterflies are more mysterious.
Hmm, I guess you're right. The way fish move their tails in the water, creating ripples that build and overlap, does have quite a mysterious charm.

Well, that settles it. I've decided to spend some time observing fish as they swim through the water.
<size=30>And I promise I won't pull out my fishing rod.</size>
Fish have a magical aura to them.
Next time I see it, I will ask it to grant a wish for me... Shhh Don't say your wish out loud or it won't come true.{微笑}

Right, I was originally observing butterflies...
The way they fly... and where they land...
Ah, could it be?!

That day, your words spurred me to do some investigating.
You'll never guess what I found out—
Oh right, shouldn't we put our hands together and make a wish to the mysterious unknown?\n{开心}I'll do as you say~

But why would the butterfly choose that place to rest...
Hmm, never mind~
Not every mystery in life needs to be answered.

Turns out it was a Lili fish with a peculiar pattern.
Its colorful markings
Reflected a mysterious glow in the moonlight.
Perhaps the telescope was revealing a prophecy to you...
Find out where the path of light leads to, of course!
But if I ever did, how should I react next time...

And you won't believe what I discovered!
On the lens,
I found butterfly scales!
I think so too. Haven't you heard the saying about how a butterfly's wings can stir up a storm far, far away?

If I get the chance, I'll tiptoe quietly,
following that wondrous path of light. Then we'll find out what is hidden beneath the water's surface...
Suddenly, a flash of light startled me awake. The gleaming light wove a meandering, ethereal path beneath the water — A golden path, as fate itself!

Good, I've decided to spend some time observing a particular type of butterfly.
<size=30>I will observe from a distance, far enough so as not to touch its scales.</size>

But I've made some repairs here and there using different materials. I even made adjustments to its structure.
{短暂停}...Could it be?!

So at night, when I used my telescope to gaze at the Celestial River,
I saw that wing-shaped light appear.
Fascinating, isn't it?

Turns out it was a <color=#8AAB4B>golden wonder killifish</color>!
They have a unique golden pattern on their bodies,
so they look just like...

The telescope?
A teacher from the Academia gave me this telescope.
They say its previous owner used it to observe a special kind of Lumia.
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, do you remember when I observed butterfly wing-shaped lights in the Milky Way through my telescope?
<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>, do you remember when I observed butterfly wing-shaped lights in the Celestial River through my telescope?

A butterfly perched on the telescope during the day,
and the scales from its wings
left traces on the lens!
Perhaps it was a sign of fate from the butterfly...

So, besides observing the Celestial River,
I want to try finding the trajectories that predict destiny
from different angles...

Life is truly filled with fascinating things~
<size=30>But why did it suddenly leap out?
Could it be objecting to the wish I made?</size>
Make a wish upon the path of light!
That day, as I watched the trails left behind on the water's surface, I gazed and gazed... until I nodded off.
You mentioned that perhaps the mystery is hidden within the telescope itself. So I looked over it carefully.
